DOC.brief_summary: This study design clinically evaluate retention development caries use self-priming ( Embrace wetbond ) conventional flowable composite ( Clinpro ) pit fissure sealant young first permanent molar .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effectiveness Embrace Wetbond Clinpro Pits Fissure Sealants Young Permanent Molars
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study design clinically evaluate retention development caries use self-priming ( Embrace Wetbond ) conventional flowable composite ( Clinpro ) pit fissure sealant young first permanent molar . PICO : P : child age 6-9 year old high caries risk . I : Embrace Wetbond . C : Clinpro seal . O : Primary outcome : Retention sealant ; Device measurement : questionnaire ; unit : binary . Secondary outcome : Retention development caries ; Device measurement : Modified simonsen 's criterion ; Unit : scoring system ( 0-4 ) tactile visual examination .
DOC.criteria: child age 69 year child high caries risk cooperative child fully erupt first permanent molar child hypoplastic teeth partially erupt uncooperative child child carious molar .
